name: Shrink Tower: Into the Jungle
description:
Enter the jungle and shrink 32 Towers in Shrink Tower: Into The Jungle! Your goal is to shrink the blocks that make up these unstable towers to bring the overall weight of the tower below the goal. 

Featuring:

- 32 increasingly challenging levels

- 5+ unique block types

- A smooth and responsive physics engine

- And much more!

Follow me, and the development of my other games on twitter here; https://twitter.com/Jexelix?lang=en

If you liked the game, consider the downloadable files, which include the 32 levels featured in the in-browser version, as well as 32 extra challenging levels
